channel.title: england on Images and Opinions
channel.description: Recent content in england on Images and Opinions

item.title: Northern England
item.description: Walks in the Lake District and Lancashire. We used to live in Northern England, close to the Lake District, but I hadn’t really started with digital photography and only took and occasional picture of my walks. We now visit friends there occasionally and sometimes I have time for a walk.

item.title: Hutton Roof
item.description: The unexpectedly early arrival of our first grandchild in spring 2019 meant that the last two weeks has been a blur of driving up and down the A90, hospital visits, homecoming and helping the new parents adjust to sleep deprivation. Writing deadlines have been missed; social media skimmed at best and email ignored. Thankfully, Mum and baby are both fine and the baby, at least, is thriving. Iâ€™ve had no time for outdoor wandering or photography, apart of course from baby photography.
